description: Example showing how custom output names make plans more user-friendly

before_change.description: Before the change, all outputs had to match plugin definitions exactly

plan.description: Ask user for their favorite color

outputs.response: User's response (forced to use plugin's output name)

outputs.result: File operation result (forced to use plugin's output name)

after_change.description: After the change, planners can use descriptive, context-appropriate output names

plan.description: Ask user for their favorite color

outputs.favoriteColor: The user's favorite color (descriptive custom name)

outputs.saveStatus: Status of saving the color preference (descriptive custom name)

outputs.colorNameStats: Statistics about the color name (descriptive custom name)
outputs.colorSentiment: Emotional tone of the color name (descriptive custom name)
outputs.colorKeywords: Key terms in the color description (descriptive custom name)

benefits: Plans are more readable and self-documenting
Output names provide context about what the data represents
Dependencies are clearer when using descriptive names
LLMs can generate more intuitive plans
Human users can better understand plan flow
No loss of functionality - system still validates output count and types
